Key Match Events: The game was postponed due to inclement weather and less-than-ideal field conditions
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams had already secured their respective seeds in the AL playoff bracket before the game, allowing MLB to cancel it without making it up
Post-Match Reflections: José Ramírez was close to achieving a 40-40-40 season but couldn't due to the game cancellation; the Guardians focused on protecting their players' health for the postseason
Miscellaneous Highlights: A 40-40-40 season is rare, with only Alfonso Soriano having achieved it in 2006; José Ramírez was the second player to reach 39-39-40
